description.zh-cn: 黄春树命案的被告之一，历经21年诉讼，最终被判无罪。
description.en: One of the defendants in the Huang Chun-shu murder case, who was eventually acquitted after 21 years of litigation.

description.zh-cn: 1995年发生的一起绑架勒赎撕票案，导致徐自强被错误定罪并缠讼多年。
description.en: A kidnapping, ransom, and murder case that occurred in 1995, leading to the wrongful conviction and lengthy legal battle of Hsu Tzu-chiang.

description.zh-cn: 黄春树命案的嫌犯之一，其供词导致徐自强被卷入案件。
description.en: One of the suspects in the Huang Chun-shu murder case, whose testimony implicated Hsu Tzu-chiang.

description.zh-cn: 黄春树命案的嫌犯之一，曾供称徐自强为共犯，后又翻供。
description.en: One of the suspects in the Huang Chun-shu murder case, who initially implicated Hsu Tzu-chiang as an accomplice but later recanted his testimony.

description.zh-cn: 1995年黄春树命案中的被害人，为房屋中介商。
description.en: The victim in the 1995 Huang Chun-shu murder case, who was a real estate agent.

description.zh-cn: 黄春树命案的嫌犯之一，黄春棋的哥哥，案发后在泰国被杀。
description.en: One of the suspects in the Huang Chun-shu murder case, brother of Huang Chun-chi, who was murdered in Thailand after the crime.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的二级法院，多次审理徐自强案，在更九审中判决其无罪。
description.en: The secondary court of the Republic of China, which tried the Hsu Tzu-chiang case multiple times and acquitted him in the ninth retrial.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的检察机关，在徐自强被判无罪后坚持上诉。
description.en: The prosecutorial agency of the Republic of China, which insisted on appealing after Hsu Tzu-chiang was acquitted.

en: Supreme Court of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高审判机关，多次将徐自强案发回更审，并最终驳回上诉，判决徐自强无罪定谳。
description.en: The highest judicial body of the Republic of China, which repeatedly sent the Hsu Tzu-chiang case back for retrial and ultimately rejected the appeal, finalizing his acquittal.

description.zh-cn: 为徐自强义务辩护的律师。
description.en: A lawyer who provided pro bono defense for Hsu Tzu-chiang.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的一项法律，其规定使得徐自强在未定谳的情况下得以释放。
description.en: A law in the Republic of China, whose provisions allowed Hsu Tzu-chiang to be released from custody pending a final verdict.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高监察机关，曾介入调查徐自强案并指出判决中的疑点。
description.en: The highest control body of the Republic of China, which investigated the Hsu Tzu-chiang case and pointed out questionable aspects of the judgment.

en: Justices of the Constitutional Court, Judicial Yuan

description.zh-cn: 中华民国司法院的宪法法庭组成人员，其释宪结果对徐自强案的重审至关重要。
description.en: Members of the Constitutional Court of the Judicial Yuan of the Republic of China, whose constitutional interpretation was crucial for the retrial of the Hsu Tzu-chiang case.

description.zh-cn: 由司法院大法官作出的宪法解释，宣告用于将徐自强定罪的判例违宪，为案件带来转机。
description.en: A constitutional interpretation by the Justices of the Constitutional Court that declared the legal precedents used to convict Hsu Tzu-chiang unconstitutional, creating a turning point in the case.

description.zh-cn: 时任中华民国检察总长，依据释字第582号解释为徐自强案提起第五次非常上诉。
description.en: The then Prosecutor General of the Republic of China, who filed the fifth extraordinary appeal in the Hsu Tzu-chiang case based on J.Y. Interpretation No. 582.

description.zh-cn: 为徐自强提供不在场证明的证人。
description.en: A witness who provided an alibi for Hsu Tzu-chiang.

description.zh-cn: 对徐自强等人提起公诉的检察机关。
description.en: The prosecutorial office that indicted Hsu Tzu-chiang and others.

description.zh-cn: 对徐自强案进行一审并判处其死刑的法院。
description.en: The court of first instance that tried the Hsu Tzu-chiang case and sentenced him to death.

description.zh-cn: 被害人黄春树的父亲。
description.en: Father of the victim, Huang Chun-shu.

description.zh-cn: 徐自强因黄春树命案被错误指控，经历了长达21年的审判，期间多次被判处死刑和无期徒刑，并被羁押16年。
description.en: Hsu Tzu-chiang was wrongly accused in the Huang Chun-shu murder case, enduring a 21-year trial, during which he was sentenced to death and life imprisonment multiple times and detained for 16 years.

description.zh-cn: 黄春树在此案中被绑架勒赎并杀害。
description.en: Huang Chun-shu was kidnapped for ransom and murdered in this case.

description.zh-cn: 作为主犯之一参与了绑架和杀害黄春树。
description.en: Participated as one of the main perpetrators in the kidnapping and murder of Huang Chun-shu.

description.zh-cn: 作为主犯之一参与了绑架和杀害黄春树。
description.en: Participated as one of the main perpetrators in the kidnapping and murder of Huang Chun-shu.

description.zh-cn: 作为主犯之一参与了绑架和杀害黄春树。
description.en: Participated as one of the main perpetrators in the kidnapping and murder of Huang Chun-shu.

description.zh-cn: 在警方讯问中谎称徐自强为共犯，导致徐自强被卷入此案。
description.en: Falsely implicated Hsu Tzu-chiang as an accomplice during police interrogation, causing Hsu to be involved in the case.

description.zh-cn: 在被捕后供称徐自强为共犯，是法院将徐自强定罪的主要依据之一。
description.en: After his arrest, he testified that Hsu Tzu-chiang was an accomplice, which was one of the main bases for the court's conviction of Hsu.

description.zh-cn: 在看守所内翻供，书写自白书证明徐自强并未参与此案，称先前是为了拖延诉讼而陷害他。
description.en: Recanted his testimony in the detention center, writing a confession stating that Hsu Tzu-chiang was not involved in the case and that he had previously framed him to delay the legal proceedings.

description.zh-cn: 以掳人勒赎罪嫌起诉徐自强。
description.en: Indicted Hsu Tzu-chiang on charges of kidnapping for ransom.

description.zh-cn: 一审判处徐自强死刑。
description.en: Sentenced Hsu Tzu-chiang to death in the first instance.

description.zh-cn: 在更九审中撤销原判决，改判徐自强无罪。
description.en: In the ninth retrial, it overturned the original verdict and acquitted Hsu Tzu-chiang.

description.zh-cn: 多次将有罪判决发回更审，并最终驳回检察官的上诉，判决徐自强无罪定谳。
description.en: Repeatedly sent guilty verdicts back for retrial and ultimately rejected the prosecutor's appeal, finalizing Hsu Tzu-chiang's acquittal.

description.zh-cn: 在台湾高等法院更九审判决徐自强无罪后，坚持向最高法院提起上诉。
description.en: After the Taiwan High Court acquitted Hsu Tzu-chiang in the ninth retrial, it insisted on appealing to the Supreme Court.

description.zh-cn: 介入调查并发布报告，指出原审法院采证、调查过程存在多项重大瑕疵。
description.en: Intervened and issued a report, pointing out several major flaws in the original trial court's evidence gathering and investigation process.

description.zh-cn: 此号释宪案宣告采纳共同被告不利己自白的相关判例违宪，剥夺了诘问权，为徐自强案的重审提供了法律依据。
description.en: This constitutional interpretation declared relevant precedents admitting co-defendants' self-incriminating confessions unconstitutional for violating the right to cross-examination, providing a legal basis for the retrial of Hsu Tzu-chiang's case.

description.zh-cn: 应徐自强律师声请，作出释字第582号解释。
description.en: Made the J.Y. Interpretation No. 582 in response to the petition from Hsu Tzu-chiang's lawyers.

description.zh-cn: 担任检察总长期间，依据释字第582号解释为徐自强案提起第五次非常上诉。
description.en: During his tenure as Prosecutor General, he filed the fifth extraordinary appeal for Hsu Tzu-chiang's case based on J.Y. Interpretation No. 582.

description.zh-cn: 该法规定被告羁押不得超过八年，使徐自强在案件未定谳的情况下得以获释。
description.en: This act stipulates that a defendant's detention cannot exceed eight years, which led to Hsu Tzu-chiang's release while his case was still pending.

description.zh-cn: 长期为徐自强提供义务法律辩护，是推动案件平反的关键人物之一。
description.en: Provided long-term pro bono legal defense for Hsu Tzu-chiang, becoming one of the key figures in overturning the conviction.

description.zh-cn: 作为证人，证明案发当天中午徐自强在母亲住处用餐，为徐自强提供了不在场证明。
description.en: As a witness, she testified that Hsu Tzu-chiang was having a meal at his mother's residence at noon on the day of the crime, providing him with an alibi.

description.zh-cn: 黄春树是黄健云的长子。
description.en: Huang Chun-shu is the eldest son of Huang Chien-yun.

description.zh-cn: 黄铭泉是黄春棋的哥哥。
description.en: Huang Ming-chuan is the brother of Huang Chun-chi.
